data.name: Unit-Weighted*UW1
data.def: All input and output arcs weight 1.
data.ref: Thomas Hujsa. Contribution to the study of weighted Petri nets. Modeling and Simulation. UniversitéPierre et Marie Curie - Paris VI, 2014. English. <NNT: 2014PA066342>. <tel-01127406> http://thomas-hujsa.fr/images/PDF/Thesis-Hujsa.pdf

data.name: State-Machine*SM1
data.def: Each transition has exactly one input arc and one output arc.
data.ref: Thomas Hujsa. Contribution to the study of weighted Petri nets. Modeling and Simulation. UniversitéPierre et Marie Curie - Paris VI, 2014. English. <NNT: 2014PA066342>. <tel-01127406> http://thomas-hujsa.fr/images/PDF/Thesis-Hujsa.pdf

data.name: Marked-Graph*MG1
data.def: Each place has exactly one input arc and one output arc.
data.ref: Thomas Hujsa. Contribution to the study of weighted Petri nets. Modeling and Simulation. UniversitéPierre et Marie Curie - Paris VI, 2014. English. <NNT: 2014PA066342>. <tel-01127406> http://thomas-hujsa.fr/images/PDF/Thesis-Hujsa.pdf

data.name: Join-Free*JF1,JF2
data.def: Each transition has exactly one input arc.
data.ref: Thomas Hujsa. Contribution to the study of weighted Petri nets. Modeling and Simulation. UniversitéPierre et Marie Curie - Paris VI, 2014. English. <NNT: 2014PA066342>. <tel-01127406> http://thomas-hujsa.fr/images/PDF/Thesis-Hujsa.pdf

data.name: Choice-Free*CF1,CF2
data.def: No shared place, each place has at most one output arc.
data.ref: Thomas Hujsa. Contribution to the study of weighted Petri nets. Modeling and Simulation. UniversitéPierre et Marie Curie - Paris VI, 2014. English. <NNT: 2014PA066342>. <tel-01127406> http://thomas-hujsa.fr/images/PDF/Thesis-Hujsa.pdf

data.name: Fork-Attribution*FA1
data.def: A Join Free and Choice Free net.
data.ref: Thomas Hujsa. Contribution to the study of weighted Petri nets. Modeling and Simulation. UniversitéPierre et Marie Curie - Paris VI, 2014. English. <NNT: 2014PA066342>. <tel-01127406> http://thomas-hujsa.fr/images/PDF/Thesis-Hujsa.pdf

data.name: Equal-Conflict*EC1
data.ref: Thomas Hujsa. Contribution to the study of weighted Petri nets. Modeling and Simulation. UniversitéPierre et Marie Curie - Paris VI, 2014. English. <NNT: 2014PA066342>. <tel-01127406> http://thomas-hujsa.fr/images/PDF/Thesis-Hujsa.pdf

data.name: Free-Choice*FC1
data.def: If two transitions have at least one shared input places, they have no other input places.
data.ref: Thomas Hujsa. Contribution to the study of weighted Petri nets. Modeling and Simulation. UniversitéPierre et Marie Curie - Paris VI, 2014. English. <NNT: 2014PA066342>. <tel-01127406> http://thomas-hujsa.fr/images/PDF/Thesis-Hujsa.pdf

data.name: Restricted-FC*RFC1
data.def: A Free-Choice net in which every place  holds post(p)>1 => pre(post(p))=p
data.ref: Joachim Wehler, Free-Choice Petri Nets without frozen tokens and Bipolar Synchronization Systems, https://arxiv.org/abs/cs/0609095

data.name: Asymmetric-Choice*AC1
data.def: if two places have common input transitions then the set of input transitions of the one is a subset of the set of input transitions of the other.
data.ref: Thomas Hujsa. Contribution to the study of weighted Petri nets. Modeling and Simulation. UniversitéPierre et Marie Curie - Paris VI, 2014. English. <NNT: 2014PA066342>. <tel-01127406> http://thomas-hujsa.fr/images/PDF/Thesis-Hujsa.pdf

data.name: Pure*P1
data.def: The net has no self loop.
data.ref: T. Murata, Petri nets: Properties, analysis and applications, in Proceedings of the IEEE, vol. 77, no. 4, pp. 541-580, April 1989, doi: 10.1109/5.24143.

data.name: NP-Simple-Side-Cond*NPSSC1
data.def: The net can contain self loop only with weights of 1.
data.ref: Reference missing.

data.name: Circuit*CI1
data.def: Each node has exactly one input and one output.
data.ref: Reference missing.

data.name: Homogeneous-with-1-shared-place*H1S1
data.def: Homogeneous net with at most 1 shared place.
data.ref: Hujsa, Thomas & Berthomieu, Bernard & Dal Zilio, Silvano & Botlan, Didier. (2020). On the Petri Nets with a Single Shared Place and Beyond. https://arxiv.org/abs/2005.04818
